title: Failed to request validator duties
body:
Issue reported by `@canbo` on Teku Discord.

Context: 10 validators were loaded, but they are not yet activated. I suspect we need to add a check in `ValidatorApiHandler.getDuties()` that the validator is active, or somewhere further down the pipeline may be better.

Version: `teku/v0.12.1-dev-deb61dfc/linux-aarch_64/-ubuntu-openjdk64bitservervm-java-11`

```
18:08:45.867 INFO  - Slot Event  *** Slot: 73093, Block: 572f8b..7a8d, Epoch: 2284, Finalized checkpoint: 2282, Finalized root: 80d0f8..48f8, Peers: 20
18:08:49.051 ERROR - Failed to request validator duties for epoch 2283. Retrying after delay.
```
